thread.title: BRIEF-UK's 888 Holdings says to launch in Denmark and Romania
thread.title_full: BRIEF-UK's 888 Holdings says to launch in Denmark and Romania

title: BRIEF-UK's 888 Holdings says to launch in Denmark and Romania
text:
BRIEF-UK's 888 Holdings says to launch in Denmark and Romania Sept 3 
Sept 3 888 Holdings Plc : 
* Its decision to launch in Danish and newly regulated Romanian online gaming markets 
* 888.com has been authorized to launch three of its prominent online brands, as part of business's ongoing strategy to expand into regulated gaming market 
* 888Poker, 888casino and 888sport are currently open for registration and are available for real money play in romania Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom; +44 207 542 1810) Trending On Reuters 
Thomson Reuters is the world's largest international multimedia news agency, providing investing news , world news , business news , technology news , headline news, small business news , news alerts, personal finance , stock market , and mutual funds information available on Reuters.com, video , mobile , and interactive television platforms. Thomson Reuters journalists are subject to an Editorial Handbook which requires fair presentation and disclosure of relevant interests.
